Package model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Model
  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the Model of the MVC based Connect4 game. The model holds the data of the game. This game is a 6 x 7 grid based game. The top(7th) additional row represents the space where the player clicks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model()
        Constructor for the model class. The constructor initializes the game grid to 0 = white spaces.

    • Method Detail

      • getModelGrid

        public int[][] getModelGrid()
        Getter method to access model's grid
        Returns:
        model's grid

      • updateColorGrid

        public int updateColorGrid​(int column,
                           int color)
        This method is called by the constructor and updates the model's grid based on the click coordinates received by the controller from the WindowView
        Parameters:
        column - the column on which player clicks
        color - the player's color, 1: Red or 2: Yellow
        Returns:
        returns the next available row in the column that user clicks

      • checkIfConsecutiveRows

        public boolean checkIfConsecutiveRows​(int startingRow,
                                      int color,
                                      int minConsecutiveRow)
        This method is called from the constructor to check if there is a horizontal win
        Parameters:
        startingRow - the row where disc is inserted after click
        color - the color of the player, 1: Red, 2: Yellow
        minConsecutiveRow - the minimum consecutive discs of the same color required to win
        Returns:
        returns true, if there is a winning row. False otherwise.

      • checkIfConsecutiveColumns

        public boolean checkIfConsecutiveColumns​(int startingRow,
                                         int startingColumn,
                                         int color,
                                         int minConsecutiveCol)
        This method is called by the constructor to check if there is a vertical win
        Parameters:
        startingRow - the row where disc is inserted after click
        startingColumn - the column where new disc is inserted after click
        color - the color of the player
        minConsecutiveCol - the minimum consecutive discs of the same color required to win
        Returns:
        returns true, if there is a winning column. False otherwise.

      • checkIfRightDownDiagonal

        public boolean checkIfRightDownDiagonal​(int startingRow,
                                        int startingColumn,
                                        int color,
                                        int minConsecutiveDiag)
        This method is called by the constructor to check if a right diagonal sequence of 4 consecutive slots of same color are completed
        Parameters:
        startingRow - the row number where new disc is going to get placed
        startingColumn - the column number where new disc is going to get place.
        color - player
        minConsecutiveDiag - minimum no. of consecutive slots of same color required for win
        Returns:
        true if right diagonal is complete, false otherwise

      • checkIfLeftDownDiagonal

        public boolean checkIfLeftDownDiagonal​(int startingRow,
                                       int startingColumn,
                                       int color,
                                       int minConsecutiveElem)
        This method is called by the constructor to check if a left diagonal sequence of 4 consecutive slots of same color are completed
        Parameters:
        startingRow - the row number where new disc is going to get placed
        startingColumn - the column number where new disc is going to get place.
        color - player
        minConsecutiveElem - minimum no. of consecutive slots of same color required for win
        Returns:
        true if right diagonal is complete, false otherwise
